title: Chicago Gallery
copy: Please fill out our inquiry form to learn more about rental opportunities.   Available Friday–Wednesday, 6:00–11:30 p.m. Capacity: 100 reception style, 100 ceremony The Chicago Gallery is an intimate space located just outside the Chicago Stock Exchange Trading Room. This unique space, with its plentiful sunlight and lush views of Grant Park, is the perfect place to host a cocktail reception or to exchange vows.
